results.content: Good overview course of Firebase.  However, I thought the instructor went a little fast.  I would have liked a little slower pace with more explanation of the Firebase concepts
results.content_html: Good overview course of Firebase. However, I thought the instructor went a little fast. I would have liked a little slower pace with more explanation of the Firebase concepts

results.content:
Awesome course! Btw, I already have been playing around with React and Firebase, so this course entirely focused on a real-world project was great! 

I would recommend you give Firebase + React a try by yourself first, and then take this course.
results.content_html:

results.content: It was a bit fast. Maybe a bit more on more firebase stuff and less react. =]

results.content: Very helpful course, I learned a lot.

results.content: Reed is a great instructor. You have to come prepared since it is not a course for absolute beginners but as usual with Reed, you build an app in record time, using up to date technologies and great design.
results.content_html: Reed is a great instructor. You have to come prepared since it is not a course for absolute beginners but as usual with Reed, you build an app in record time, using up to date technologies and great design.

results.content: Sim, direto ao ponto! Falta-me vivência em React para aproveitar melhor.
